item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 21, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: Dia, an open-weights TTS model for generating realistic dialogue (66 points | 24 comments)
3. Adding keyword parameters to Tcl procs (23 points | discuss)
4. Launch HN: Magic Patterns (YC W23) – AI Design and Prototyping for Product Teams (64 points | 29 comments)

8. Out of the Fog (102 points | 16 comments)
9. Spark AI (YC W24) is hiring a full-stack engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)

26. Gemma 3 QAT Models: Bringing AI to Consumer GPUs (569 points | 259 comments)

29. The effect of deactivating Facebook and Instagram on users' emotional state (418 points | 407 comments)
